body.name: NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC Travel tripod Kit, 5-Section Legs, lightweight aluminum,compatible with Canon, Nikon,Sony DSLR, 2-Way Fluid Head, Twist Locks, Quick Release Plate, 6KG Load Capacity with carry bag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: THE IDEAL TRAVEL COMPANION: The National Geographic Travel Photo Tripod Kit is a complete, lightweight and compact solution for on-the-go photography and made of high-quality Aluminum Universal and Compatible.
AMAZING SMOOTH FOOTAGE: The head offers two independent fluid movements for high control during video capture, quick release plate and 2 bubble levels
COMPACT AND MIGHTY: From CSCs to DSLRs with zoom lenses and medium-sized spotting scopes scopes, this model securely supports a payload of kit up to 6kg

QUICK-RELEASE PLATE: Helps install and remove camera in seconds. It makes fast transitions between shots and quickly moving from spot to spot possible. Built-in bubble level contributes to exact horizontal alignment.
HANDLES TOUGH CONDITIONS EFFORTLESSLY: Thanks to the three leg-angle stops you can set up on almost any surface, intuitively and in record time thanks to the 4-section twist lock mechanism.
TWO SOLUTIONS IN ONE: When you prefer single leg support, no need to reach for extra kit. Just detach the integrated monopod-leg and attach it to the center column.
What You Get: The National Geographic Travel Photo Tripod Kit comes in its own stylish branded bag for easy storage and transportation
body.description: The National Geographic Travel Video Tripod is a compact, sturdy, and lightweight aluminium tripod kit that is also highly versatile. It extends up to a height of 165cm, folds down to just 41 cm and is easy to pack in most bags. The National Geographic Travel Video Tripod is ideal for shooting video with CSCs, mirrorless and DLSR cameras and birdwatching with medium-sized spotting scopes, thanks to its payload up to 6kg.The head offers two independent fluid movements , pan and tilt, for high and smooth control during video capture. Enjoy instant and effortless camera attachment with the quick-release plate 1/4''-20 camera screw on top. The head also has 2 built-in bubble levels for high-precision levelling. The tripod features three leg-angle stops allowing versatile positioning on almost any surface and a 5-sections leg twist-lock mechanism.This smart and extremely lightweight tripod is designed with a full-size monopod integrated into it. To use the monopod, just remove the tripod leg with the padded leg-warmer and attach the centre column.Since lightness is a travel tripod must, photographers can rely on the spring-loaded hook located at the bottom of the centre column to add additional weight for extra stability when needed.It comes in its own bag for easy storage and transport. "

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the product shown as picture
reviews.reviewText: Retuned, requested a replace after received the first order, both order are the same product, you cannot horizontally mount your camera as their advertizing picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-made, sturdy tripod
reviews.reviewText: Amazon messed up the photos. The summary and description are correct. What you get is a two way head tripod as shown here: https://a.co/d/0pzJnUK. It's a very well-made, sturdy tripod. The photos are about a different, ball-head tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT as shown in photos
reviews.reviewText: The product shown is a carbon fiber tripod...Description says Aluminum.
